autoCommit.description: If set to True, all changes to a table take effect immediately. If set to 0, you must use COMMIT to accept a transaction or ROLLBACK to cancel it

maxAllowedPacket.description: The maximum size of one packet or any generated/intermediate string. ( size in MB )

maxConnections.description: The maximum permitted number of  simultaneous client connections

skipInnodb.description: If set to False, InnoDB storage engine is available. If you do not use it, you can disable it to save memory
